definitions.body: prob. erron., cf. Kö:Synt. 157 Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 68) wild ass (prob. from swiftness);—´[[פ]] abs. Ho 8:9 + (so Je 2:24 Gi; van d. H. Baer [[פֶּרֶךְ]]), cstr. Ge 16:12; pl. [[פְּרָאִים]] Je 14:6 +;—wild ass Je 14:6, Job 6:5, Job 39:5, Is 32:14, Ps 104:11; ´[[עַיִר פ]] Job 11:12 wild ass's colt; [[אָדָם]] ´[[פ]] Ge 16:12 (J) a wild ass of a man (Ishmael as a free nomad); fig. of wilfulness Ho 8:9 (v. I. [[בָּדַד]]); of lust Je 2:24 (i.e. Israel's love of idolatry); of poor desert-dwellers Job 24:5.
